segments.text: I see the water flowing continuously from the faucet, filling the sink and spilling over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a large puddle on the floor, and it's only getting bigger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems completely unaware of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm she looks, drying dishes while standing in water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets and floor are getting soaked, and it's a bit heartbreaking to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the water has been overflowing like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window is so peaceful, it's a stark contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of helplessness, wishing I could turn off the faucet myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes on the counter are neatly stacked, waiting to be put away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices the water soon, before it causes any serious damage.
segments.speaker: PAR
